channel.title: Updating my interface - PI

item.title: Updating my interface - PI
item.dc:creator: @Agent_Jugz Agent Jugz
item.description:
@Agent_Jugz wrote:

i have a minigame and what i want to do is:

every time you kill an npc it updates the interface so, for example:

MONSTER KILLS: 0

then you kill the monster and:

MONSTER KILLS: 1

hereâ€™s what i have so far:

public void setInterface() { for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[j]; if (c.getPA().inTrollheim()) { c.getPA().sendFrame126("Goblin kills: "+GOBLIN_KILLS+"", 21120); c.getPA().walkableInterface(21119); } } } }

then:

HELP WOULD BE REALLY APPREICATED!

Read full topic
